biotools.summary: A program to simulate genotypes in family members for a map of linked markers unlinked to a given affection status locus. the output is ready for analysis with UNKNOWN, ISIM, LSIM, or MSIM of the SLINK package.

bioschemas.name: SIMULATE
bioschemas.summary: A program to simulate genotypes in family members for a map of linked markers unlinked to a given affection status locus. the output is ready for analysis with UNKNOWN, ISIM, LSIM, or MSIM of the SLINK package.
